title: Cub Swanson def. Kron Gracie at UFC on ESPN+ 19: Best photos
text:
Check out the best photos from Cub Swanson’s unanimous decision win over Kron Gracie at UFC on ESPN+ 19 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. (Photos by Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports)

Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Cub Swanson (red gloves) prior to the fight against Kron… Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Cub Swanson (red gloves) prior to the fight against Kron Gracie (not pictured) during UFC Fight Night at Amalie Arena. Mandatory Credit: Reinhold Matay-USA TODAY Sports more
